SELECT
FROM COMPLAINT_INFO a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.case_number LIKE '%'||#{caseNumber}||'%' '%'+#{caseNumber}+'%' concat('%',#{caseNumber},'%')
AND a.visitor_name LIKE '%'||#{visitorName}||'%' '%'+#{visitorName}+'%' concat('%',#{visitorName},'%')
AND a.visitor_mobile LIKE '%'||#{visitorMobile}||'%' '%'+#{visitorMobile}+'%' concat('%',#{visitorMobile},'%')
AND a.patient_name LIKE '%'||#{patientName}||'%' '%'+#{patientName}+'%' concat('%',#{patientName},'%')
AND o1.id LIKE '%'||#{involveHospital}||'%' '%'+#{involveHospital}+'%' concat('%',#{involveHospital},'%')
AND a.involve_department LIKE '%'||#{involveDepartment}||'%' '%'+#{involveDepartment}+'%' concat('%',#{involveDepartment},'%')
AND (a.reception_date BETWEEN #{receptionDate} AND #{receptionEndDate})
AND a.create_by = #{user.id}
AND a.create_by in
#{id}
GROUP BY a.complaint_id
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

FROM COMPLAINT_INFO
INNER JOIN SYS_OFFICE o9 ON a.involve_hospital = o9.name
o9.id = a.a.involve_hospital

mapper.select:
SELECT a.create_by,u.office_id,u.name,a.visitor_date,count(1) amount,o.name AS deptName FROM COMPLAINT_INFO a LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u on u.id=a.create_by LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE o ON o.id=u.office_id WHERE a.del_flag ='0'
AND a.visitor_date >= #{visitorDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.visitor_date <= #{visitorDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorDate},'%')
AND a.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorDate},'%')
AND a.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorDateEnd},'%')
AND a.visitor_date >= #{visitorMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.visitor_date <= #{visitorMonthDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND a.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorMonthDate},'%')
AND a.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorMonthDate},'%')
AND a.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorMonthDateEnd},'%')
AND u.office_id like concat('%',#{involveDepartment},'%')
AND u.id like concat('%',#{involveEmployee},'%')
GROUP BY a.create_by

select Max(case a.handle_way when '0' then a.amount else 0 end ) 'ytw', Max(case a.handle_way when '1' then a.amount else 0 end ) 'dm', Max(case a.handle_way when '2' then a.amount else 0 end ) 'zb' FROM ( SELECT count(1)AS amount,cc.handle_way FROM COMPLAINT_INFO cc WHERE cc.del_flag ='0'
AND cc.visitor_date >= #{visitorDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cc.visitor_date <= #{visitorDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND cc.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorDate},'%')
AND cc.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorDate},'%')
AND cc.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorDateEnd},'%')
AND cc.visitor_date >= #{visitorMonthDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cc.visitor_date <= #{visitorMonthDateEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND cc.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorMonthDate},'%')
AND cc.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorMonthDate},'%')
AND cc.visitor_date like concat('%',#{visitorMonthDateEnd},'%')
AND cc.create_by like concat('%',#{createBy},'%')
GROUP BY cc.handle_way )a
